Amazon Web Services - AWS Support | Seattle, WA | Onsite

We are developing a diagnostic tool for support engineers to troubleshoot customer problems. If you are a customer-focused person (hey, we are in the same building with our customers), and interested in distributed architectures (as everything else in AWS, this tool is also distributed with its own unique requirements), and have an interest in functional programming (we love functional programming, we have been using Scala for a little bit less than a year), then let us know, we would like to talk to you.

Details can be found here; http://www.amazon.jobs/jobs/318617/software-development-engi...
